verses.name: Luke 5:33
verses.text: And they said unto him, Why do the disciples of John fast often, and make prayers, and likewise the disciples of the Pharisees; but thine eat and drink?

verses.name: Luke 5:34
verses.text: And he said unto them, Can ye make the children of the bridechamber fast, while the bridegroom is with them?

verses.name: Luke 5:35
verses.text: But the days will come, when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them, and then shall they fast in those days.
